```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(httr)

# Connecting to news API about Apple
try <- GET("https://api.nasa.gov/neo/rest/v1/feed?start_date=2022-06-01&end_date=2022-06-07&api_key=r6dkgZPsg9wTctOy0pRVe3Ldhgk7mjcHZGuJMeNc")
```


```{r, warning = FALSE}
library(dbplyr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)

# Look for element wanted
str(try, max.level = 1)

# Grabbing List element we want and converts it to character
parsed <- fromJSON(rawToChar(try$content))

# Look for element wanted
str(parsed, max.level = 1)

# Looking at column names for parsed articles
parsed$articles %>% colnames()

# Create tibble of source, author, and title
sourceAuthorTitle <- parsed$articles[1:3] %>% as_tibble()
sourceAuthorTitle
```
